1.content: There are quite a few girls in the world of smash - who do you choose?
1.title: Choosing a Girl

11.content:
It was a very long night. The new Super Smash Bros. for Wii U had just came out you spent the entire night playing online with friends and whatnot. You tried out many of the new characters but found that you had the best time playing as Lucina, Chrom's daughter from the future. After a whole day and night of nothing but smacking people around with Lucina's Falchion you decided it was time for a well deserved rest. Your eyes grow heavy and you smile as you drift into sleep knowing that when you wake up, more smashing with Lucina awaits.
You wake up in a strange surrounding. The floors are wooden as well as the rest of the room. There is one bed in the far corner with a desk right next to it. You think that you're dreaming so you try a wake yourself up. You try and try but nothing. You're so busy trying that you didn't even notice the strangest part about this room. It was HUGE. There was nothing really to compare your size to but you soon realize that you are very small. Sudden the door in front of you begins to produce sound. The doorknob shakes and you realize that someone was about to enter the room. You had to think fast. Would you hide from the giant that was about to enter the room or would confront then and try to get their attention?
11.title: Strange Awakening

111.content:
You stand in the middle of the room, waiting in great suspense for what was about to enter the room. Your jaw nearly hits the floor when you see Lucina, in all her shining glory, enter the room. You HAD to be dreaming now but dream or not, you wanted to get her attention. You jump up and down while flailing your arms and screaming, "DOWN HERE LUCINA! PLEASE LOOK DOWN!". You the size of an insect compared to her. How would she ever notice you? To add to that, Lucina looked extremely tired and a bit irratated. You notice her mumbling to herself as she closes the door behind and begins to walk towards her bed. Her footsteps appear slow to you but they cover a great deal of ground. You had gone unnoticed and now had to chase the giantess over to her bed. The rooms was descent sized to Lucina but to you it was overwhelmingly big. Lucina had reached her bed and plopped herself on it with her boots dangling just off the floor.
After what seemed like forever, you finally reached her titanic boots. Being this close you realize that you aren't as small as you thought. You could see the tops of her shoes so you bigger than her toes at least. Just barely though. With this in mind you begin pound on her dangling feet in hope of a responce from her. After only about a minute of punching ferociously Lucina wakes up and looks down by her feet to see what had just disturbed her rest. She stares down, tracking the floor by her boots, until her eyes light up, as if she had just remembered something. You are now regreting your decision as Lucina reaches down for you with a menecing smlie.
She lifts you to her face and says, "I almost forgot about you. I asked Tharja to shrink down for making me fight for such a long time. Don't you think that I get tired too!?!". Her voice is deafening and you cover you ears to prevent them from being blown out. When she's done scolding you, you begin to beg. You have no idea what she had in store for you but at her size you did not what to find out. Begging brings a smile to her face. "Very well. I won't torture you until morning but until then, you will need a place to stay." Where will Lucina put you?
111.title: Lucina finds her victim

choices: wake up still in her boot
wake up on the floor next to Lucina's bare feet
1111.content: You're relieved that your "torture" has been delayed but still frightened by the fact that this giantess that you once idolized now had almost full control over you. Your fears grow even more when you see her slipping off her right boot. You are vlose enough to notice the horrid smell emitting from them. You swore that you could even SEE the smell coming from the boots. She looks at you, satisfied that you obviously don't like the idea of spending the while night in her wretched boot. "Get use to the smell because that is where you will sleeping for a while.". She laughs lightly to herself and drops you in whithout any second thoughts. You instintly cover your nose bit that does little to nothing in combating the overpowering stetch that Lucina's feet had left behind. The smell eventually is too much for you to handle and you mercifully pass out.
1111.title: Sleeping in the doghouse.

11112.content: You wake up and your head is throbbing from the noxious fumes that you had to suffer all night in Lucina's sweaty boot. You soon notice, however, that you are on the wooden floor. The fresh air is an amazing releif and take up as much of it as possible. You were so busy gasping for clean air that you didn't even notice Lucina enter the room. "Finally awake little one? If you thought sleeping in my boot was bad just wait for what I have in store next." You look up at her figure and you shudder at the thought of what she had cooked up in her evil mind. "I just got back from the training hall and my feet could use some care. That's where you come in. You made me fight for so long that I beleive you should pay me back." With that, Lucina removes her training boots and you get the same feeling that you got the first you say her take her boots off. She wore no socks and you could literally see the sweat glistening from her sole. You finally got the courage to speak up and ask, "Uhhh, Miss Lucina? What care, exactly, do you have in mind?". She looks down at you after removing both of her boots and says, "Don't worry your tiny little head about that." She smiles and places one foot at each side of you. "Now,_____ my feet."
11112.title: Lucina's feet

choices: Become the official foot slave for Super Smash
Stay small and serve only Lucina's giant feet
111122.content:
"Lick me feet. And I want them spotless.". You look at both of her enormous feet and then up at her. You try and plead with her. "You can't be serious Lucina! I'm not even the size of you big toe! How am I suppose to clean your entire sole?". Lucina thinks this over a bit. While it was a good form of torture, she kind of did want her feet cleaned. "I'll make a deal with you little bug. I make you full sized again, and you will become the foot slave of all the girls here. Or you can stay this small, and clean my giant feet with your tiny little tongue."
You thought very carefully about what you were going to say next. At full size, the feet would be much more manageable but you would have more to deal with. But if you stay small, you would only tend to Lucina's titanic smelly feet.
What do you do?
111122.title: Licking Lucina's feet

1111221.content:
"ILL BE FULL SIZED AGAIN" you yell at the top of your lungs, desperate to be noticed. "Well it is decided then" she says as she pulls her vile sweaty foot back into the wretched boot. "Ill have Robin fix you right up, little bug." she said with a laugh, obviously pleased witg your decision. Suddenly you feel a crushing pain, and realize all to late that Lucina had kicked you with her colossal booted foot. "Wouldn't want you awake while im gone would we? You might run away, and that wouldnt be any fun at all! I have LOTS of sweaty, dirty, smelly feet for you to suffer through!" that was the last you heard before you blacked out.

When you awoke, you were full sized, on the floorwith a shadowy figure looming above you, no doubt waiting to subject to her inevitably awful feet.

Who is it?

(im only a basic member so there will be multiple pages of options)

11112212.content: Who is above you, ready for torture?

choices: Your answer makes her happy,she makes you into her pet who pleasures her feet
Your answer made her mad and she turns you into her foot slave
1112.content:
"Ok little one I will show mercy on you tonight by letting you sleep on my desk" Lucina says as she plucks you by your shirt collar and puts you on her desk which is the size of a gym to your small stature.
"Thank you."You say glad she is showing kindness towards you.
"But the only reason I am being nice to you is to answer my question as to why you made me fight for such a long time?!" Lucina asks with a tint of malice in her voice.
You stammer "Well um......"
1112.title: on the desk

choices: Tickle Time- Let's hope Lucina can help us out
Dash for the desk! It's our only hope.
Urrrrrg- I won't enjoy this but its worth a shot. (ride in the boot)
112.content:
Seeing how the unknown threat could be dangerous and the giant would most likely be less then friendly you decided to duck and hide under the bed. The door to the room begins to creak open and you realize you only have a split second to hide from the incoming giant. You dive quickly under the bed and hope the best. Luckily you land on something soft instead of the hard wood floor and you thank God. Unluckily the smell then hits you. A foul smelling scent of old corn chips barrages your nostrils and almost makes you hurl. A close examination reveals you landed on a giant blue sock, no doubt from the giant entering the room and they were not apparently big on hygiene. The foul stench would have been enough to keep you distracted but the giant entered into the room with thunder footsteps accompanied by a voice.

"Phew, what a work out today."

You instantly recognized that voice. That was the voice of your all-time favorite Smash character Lucina who you just kicked ass with previously. And in an interesting turn of events you realized she was the giant(-ess) and another thought came into your mind that made you blush a rosy red. These were her socks you were tussled in. This foul smell was the work of your princess, now goddess after a long days work.

"That one player. He had me giving it my all today."

Wait! Was she lamenting about you and how you played as her all day? Lucina continued to thunder over to the bed and sat down on it. Her giant booted feet were now right in front of you from your position under the bed.

"I mean I was flattered he used me so much hand he was good but even I need a break once in a while. I mean all those constant fights were killer on my feet."

At this she looks down at her own feet that are still contained in the prison of her boots.

"At least now I can finally relax and give these bad boys a much deserved rest."

With that Lucina bends over and starts to untie the laces of her boots. You recoil in horror and shock. Shock that your favorite (and not to bad looking) fighter has her giant head not to far from you and the fact that if her old socks smell this bad, you can only imagine how bad her boots and feet smell after you had her pull all those vigorous moves. You hide behind one of her old socks which still causes you have a gag reflex due to the smell. You almost can't imagine a princess like your Lucina could have feet whose smell rivaled and was somewhat worse then a Football team's locker room filled with old gym socks. Even if she was a tomboy!

Lucina had finally undone the laces and with glee in her eyes pulled off her two boots, letting both fall below her and near the cave of the bed. A strong smell of corn chips then permeated the room. If you thought it was bad already think again. This new smell was almost overbearing, especially given your size. As soon as those boots were off the smell hit you full force. This was also helped that now her feet were also adding to the smell as well. Lucina looked down at her blue socked feet and smile brightly.

"Aw, that feels better. But now there's still these things left." Lucina bent over and tugged both socks off, revealing a pair of cute pink tinted feet with blue nail polish the same shade as her hair. Even though you didn't have a foot fetish you had to admit there was something cute about Lucina's feet. The only thing off putting was the smell still coming from them. To make matter worse Lucina nonchalantly threw her socks under the bed... and the landed on you. If you though the old socks smelled bad think again. This freshly ripe pair was nothing compared to that. The smell was over bearing and was actually making your eyes water a little bit. Of course your size didn't help.

You still couldn't believe a girl like Lucina could produce a smell like this. As for Lucina herself she secretly enjoyed this little "quality" of hers. Something deep inside her was secretly proud and turned on by her stinky feet. The contradiction that girls like her were supposed to be clean and pristine yet she had these dogs that would make an invading army head for the hills just by the smell (an act that actually happened once when one of her boots slipped off in a fight with a risen. Needless to say neither she nor Robin knew Risen could run that fast. She also made sure to get Robin to keep it a secret after some "persuasion."). And another part of her would be dreadfully embarrassed if her secret got out. She would never be able to live it down but that also added to the excitement. However sh always had a "plan" with "methods" to make sure anyone kept quite about her little problem.

Meanwhile the stench was becoming unbearable to you. You had to think of a next course of action and think of it fast. Analyzing your surroundings you come to three choices. You see Lucina's bare feet dangling ahead of you with her soles facing under the bed in your direction. You secretly pray that shes ticklish and you can get her attention and she can help you out. You see the desk next to the bed and hope that you can safely hide there albeit with the risk and chance of being seen by Lucina if you try. The other option and the least appetizing for you is to hitch a ride in her boots and hopefully find someone less foul smelling. So what's it going to be.?
112.title: hide under the bed

1121.content:
Tickle time. You know what Lucina is like from being a fan of the Fire Emblem games and playing Awakening. Hopefully that sweet and kind Lucina can help you out. You just need to gt her attention. Shouting probably wouldn't work and might freak her out if it did. Climbing was out of the option altogether. Then you see her bare feet dangling ahead of you and you were reminded at how you would playfully tickle the soles of your sister or mother when you wanted their attention. Hopefully it would work on Lucina and she was ticklish.Trekking off of the sock and marching toward the source of the smell was hard to do but you pushed on determined. Eventually you did reach her dangling sole and due to her size you could even see some beads of sweat glistening on it. It was now or never.Time to get her attention. You used you left hand to spider on her soles while right one attacked a toe as you prayed to any deity who would listen she was ticklish. It turns out she was as her laughter started echoing throughout the room.

"Bwhahahaha-o-gwhwhwhwad. Wwwwwwhhwhwhwhwhat is t-hat?"

The Curious Lucina defensively put her soles flat on the ground and bent over to see what was tickling her. You came face to face with your blue-haired goddess and her pools of aqua blue which thanks to her size was not just literally description.

"Oh my Nagi! A little person?" She screams out in surprise. Then she takes a closer look and realizes something.

"Wait... you're that player. Who used me in all those battles!"

You smile sheepishly and scratch the back of your head.

"Eheheheh. Yeah, sorry about that. Had no idea.. well you were real."

Luckily for you it seemed Lucina was as nice here as she was in the game and smiled back.

"It's no problem! I'mglad you liked me that much though I could use a break every one and a while. My feet were killing me after those matches."

After having said that she brought her pale bare foot in your face again. Once again the smell hit and knocked you back into reality though luckily you were getting used to it by now.

"So anyway, do you know why you're here or what's going on?" She asked curiously.

"Sadly I'm in the same boat as you are. I just found myself shrunk to this size and found myself under you bed... and found your old socks."

At this she blushed bright red and laughed embarrassed.

"Oh my. Sorry about that! I was just used to living on the own with the others for so long and without parents and being chased by what amounts to zombies, changing my socks was not on my priorities back then and that bad habit seemed to stick with me."

Somehow that made too much logical sense,espically since you witnessed first hand her powerful stench.

"Sometimes me, Cynthia, and Severa would have contests to see who could get their feet the stinkiest. We got them so bad sometimes even the Risen would run away in fear of the smell."

Suddenly the door behind her opened revealing-
1121.title: Tickle Time- Let's hope Lucina can help us out

choices: "You poor thing. Let me help you."
12.content:
In your world, you were the greatest hero in the lands, you've defended the kingdom from countless threats with nothing but your wits and your trusty longsword. So the Queen decided to reward your noble deeds and give you a vacation. Being the hot-blooded warrior you are, you realize a laying on a beach just wouldn't sit well with you. You remember someone had once told about the Smash Bros. tournament. Once you sign up you take a warp star to their headquarters.

Walking through the front gates you discover a small village. The gates close behind you and you walk over to a information booth:

"Welcome contestant! This is Smash Village, where our contestants can relax and rest between battles. Please refer to your map to find your room. Good luck!"

Overcome with excitement you rush away to find your room, face buried in your map. You run around a corner and before you can look up...SLAM! You've collide with someone and fall hard on your back. You look up to see a tall beautiful woman in a flowing white dress and sandals. It's Palutena. She looks down at you and says:
12.title: Palutena

choices: ...if you manage to escape the girls' dorm!"
121.content:
"Watch where you're going!" She says in an angry tone, turning to you. "I'm the goddess of light you know! There is no reason you shouldn't see me when you are walking!" She was glaring down at you, laying on your back from just running into her. "Look at you! You can't even handle running into someone without landing on your pathetic back. Are you actually supposed to be one of my opponents?" She says in a mocking tone, which you weren't about to allow. "Hey, listen here goddess lady, I'm sorry I ran into you, but you don't even know who I am! I'm a hero!" You say, rather pissed you were being treated like this for your heroic deeds. It didn't help that Palutena began to giggle. "You? A hero? I don't believe it. Lying is disrespectful little one. You should act with better conduct in the presence of a goddess." She looked like she was about to just walk away, greatly amused after saying that. However what you said next didn't sit well with her...

"I don't care if you are a goddess or not! You've done nothing but act like a total bitch this whole time! I bet no one respects you if this is how you act." You shout, getting up and looking into her eyes, which were still higher up than you. "And I'm NOT little! Wait until I fight you, I'll teach you a lesson in manners and respect!" You hot head soon cooled down, because your little rant made Palutena stare death and fear into your very soul.

"How DARE you!" It was as if you could feel the sound of her voice she spoke with such fury. "Maybe I need to show you JUST HOW LITTLE YOU REALLY ARE!" A blinding light emitted from her staff, and soon you felt an energy envelop you. When your could finally see again, Palutena was huge, infact EVERYTHING was huge! You look up to her, she looked amused again, and began laughing when she saw your face. "Now do you see how small you are~" She bursts out laughing. "Oh your lesson isn't over yet though! I'm sure you'll change your ways...
121.title: Anger of a Goddess

1212.content:
"I hate magic." You think to yourself as massive Palutena's sandal looms over you, accompanied with a menacing grin. You brace for impact, you know your magic armour should prevent any serious harm. The mighty sandal plunged down onto you. You feel your body being conquered by an intense pressure, even with all your legendary strength you are helpless. The goddess laughs and twists her foot to further smoosh you into the pavement.

Satisfied, she lifts up her sandal to see you, stuck to the sole. She peels you off and holds you up. "Looks like I win mortal! I hope you learned some respect. Now just say sorry and I can return you to your "normal" size." You've beaten giants before, and you refuse to let this one win. You summon your strength and shout at the top of your lungs "It's not over!" you punch against Palutena's fingers and she opens her hand jerks open in pain. "Ow! you little-" she curses but it's too late, you're already running across her arm, punching down as you do. Palutena has had enough, she uses her magic and lifts you into the air, leaving you dangling helplessly. You fidget and fight but it's no use. "You're persistent" Palutena admits "But that's no excuse for such rudeness to a goddess. You're staying this way until I think you're ready." After a little thought she decides on your sentence, she'll...
1212.title: ...after your first battle!"

122.content:
Palutena offers a dainty hand. As she grips your hand to help you up, you become aware that this woman is very strong. You stand to find your self looking into her kind, blue eyes. Palutena giggles, you realize that you're staring and you avert your gaze. "I am Palutena goddess of light. It looks like that fall has given you a dislocated shoulder.Why don't you come over to my room so I can help you?"

Funny, you could swear that your shoulders seem fine, even if she was a goddess, she was still a contestant who wanted to win. Palutena explains that sometimes dislocating means your nerves play up, so it feels like your shoulder is fine when really it isn't. You're unsure if that's true. She walks closer and inspects your shoulder, "It seems pretty bad." Palutena insists "You mortals are so prideful, there's nothing wrong with accepting help you know." Maybe she's right, you think. You decide to go with her.

She grabs your hand and leads you to her room. Palutena closes the door behind you both. Her room is huge, along with a pool, a jacuse, a gym and a battle areno. None of the other rooms you've seen are anywhere near this big. "Being a Goddess has it's perks." she brags. "Now...
122.title: "You poor thing. Let me help you."

1221.content: Palutena grabbed her staff and points it at your shoulder. it envelopes in a bright light for a bit then goes away. Palutena removes her staff from your shoulder and says there all done. you thank Palutena for fixing your shoulder. she says your welcome. Suddenly Palutena's face turns bright red and looks down twiddling her thumbs. now i can hear her mumbling something to herself. some time later Palutena trying to tell me something but, she still embarrassed from earlier. finally after she gathered up enough courage she says something. could you please give me a foot rub. that was unexpected. i didn't expect palutena the goddess of light to ask me to give her a foot rub. Palutena continues to say more. i mean... you don't have to do it but,i want a bit of payment for healing your shoulder. i usually have pit do it. but i thought i might have you do it instead as payment for healing you. will you do it or not?
1221.title: ...let's fix your shoulder."

12211.content: okay i will i think i need to pay for healing so I'll do it. when Palutena hears this she became really happy. and says yaaaaay follow me to a seat. i follow her to a chair near the pool. she sit in it and i sit on the floor in front off her feet. she gets a drink and starts drinking it, after she is finished drinking it she falls asleep. while she is asleep. i take off her shoes. i moment i take them off a huge blast of smell hits my face. i realize that not only are her feet big they seem perfect in every way. except the fact that they smell awful. but not as bad as when i first took her shoes off. i see why now she was so embarrassed when asking me to do this. after a few minutes i got used to the smell. and i started rubbing her big and seemingly perfect feet. when i did i thought that It's a good thing that she is asleep right now. and while i was giving Palutena her i though other like. i didn't that i would be giving a goddess a foot rub. i also didn't think that a goddess would have smelly feet. after i finished stop of such things i was finished in giving her a foot rub as payment. i waited till she woke up to tell her i did and that i'm leaving now. right when i thought the last thing i see of would that embarrassed face. she grabs on to one of my arms stops me from leaving. and says thank you. and then she let's me leave. i then leave her room and continue looking in smash village.
12211.title: yes i will

12212.content: i'm sorry palutena but i don't want to give a foot rub. i'll be going now. okay that's i'll call pit and it like always. see you later. yeah,see you later. and i leave palutena's rom and continue to look around in smash village. THE END
12212.title: no i won't

1222.content:
...rub my feet, mortal."

Crap. You knew there had to be a catch for her kindness. But as long as she fixed your shoulder...it would be unbecoming of a gentleman to not comply. Both of you sit down, and Palutena puts her large foot on your lap to begin the process. Removing the sandals, you look at her large soles and slender toes, both of which smelled rank. She clearly had been in a few battles recently. But again, you're being a gentleman. You dig your fingers into her soles, circling your thumbs around her skin. Moving her foot slightly...
1222.title: ...rub my feet, mortal."

choices: The hit you took against the wall concussed you and you pass out.
123.content:
You hesitate at first, both a little dazed partly from the fall and partly from this goddess's shining grace, light generously poured from every inch of her and she beamed a welcoming smile...wait, she wants to fight?! You leap back up into a battle stance and your hand instinctively snaps to the hilt of your blade. You haven't tasted combat since you left home and it was time to see what Smash Bros. is all about. "Alright let's go!" You yell. The towering woman bends down to your eye level and giggles. "Such enthusiasm!" Palutena chuckles and steps back "So eager to comply for a goddess! I could really use you." That last comment went over your head, but you didn't care.

You lash your sword from your hilt for one of your trademark strikes but find it quickly blocked by a barrier of light. So you summon your strength and try again. Now you're getting frustrated. You swipe manically over and over to break through the wall to no avail. Eventually you stop about from tiredness, you can't find the strength to hold up the sword and the tip clangs as it hits the pavement. Palutena lowers the barrier to watch you pant "Aw. My little mortal needs to learn to pace himself."

My little mortal?
You think to yourself.
What does she mea-

A blue beam of light burst from her staff and slammed into your chest, hurling you into a wall. Palutena floats over to you. You can only see her sandals and you notice she has quite large feet, which makes sense given her height. You crane your neck up to see the same welcoming smile she as before. "It seems my pet has problem focusing too." Her comments are starting to unnerve you a little bit, but her nurturing aura says otherwise. You have no idea how to feel about this woman. Palutena giggles again and you break away from your train of thought before managing to stand. "Alright that's enough now, I win. Now let's go!" Palutena's tone suddenly seems somewhat sterner. "You have so much to do!" Looking into her deep, jade eyes you feel yourself calming. But your inner warrior burns to fight on for your honor!
123.title: "You must be my next opponent!"

choices: You are forced into being her personal footslave, but with "high status".
She asks for you to help her clean her sandals, as her reward for beating you.
She tests/dares you to try and beat her, now with something at stake.
1231.content:
But, however.... You, for whatever reason, simply went ahead and agree to do whatever the goddess in front of you wanted. It wasn't as if you didn't want to fight her, she just looked really...beautiful. It was like a trance, one you couldn't get out of at the moment. Why wouldn't you try your luck with her.

"Oh, how joyous! You sure are a more reason person than I expected. Most of my followers and acquaintances seem to like to anger me. Intentionally or not..." She explained, smiling innocently. Although her eyes were beginning to show shades of some kind of deception. It's really difficult to judge just what the hell she was thinking in her mind. Which added to the fact that she was beginning to float over you like she sitting in a chair, slowly taking off her, from what you could see from the insoles, sweaty and grimy sandals. "Either way... As of now..."
1231.title: You go with Palutena.

choices: You agree as you have no other choice.
12311.content:
You look at her nasty sandals she pulls off her feet. They reek of sweat and musk. "How long has it been since she showered" you thought to yourself.

Palutena giggles at you. "Because I won you will be my personal foot slave, that means you will have to clean my feet anytime I want you to."

"What do you mean clean your feet?" You ask anxious to hear what she means.

"Oh you know anytime my feet are sweaty from battle I need you to clean them with your tongue and mouth" she says sticking her big toe in your mouth "now I need my feet cleaned I worked up quite the sweat battling you" she says with a smile while floating above you
12311.title: You are forced into being her personal footslav...

1232.content:
"No way!" You proudly exclaim. "Is that really the best you got?" Your sword has stuck itself in the pavement nearby, but you are undeterred. Palutena raises an eyebrow at your ready fists.She stares at you like you're a staggering drunk. "No little man, that's enough. You'll only hurt yourself.This is over." Pet. Little man. Mortal. You're sick of this woman condescending to you! The woman now bends down to pinch your cheeks. "Be good loser and come along. It's time you serve your goddess."

Your blood boils and you do something stupid. You let out a furious right hook aiming for her face. Palutena backs off with a gasp, her eyes narrow and the light around her intensifies. You curse yourself, attacking an unaware opponent is dishonourable. You mutter and stammer apologies but it doesn't soften Palutena's bitter glare. You pull your sword from the ground and sheathe it into the scabbard. "Look" You begin. "I'm sorry, can I make it up to?" The goddess finally speaks. "Why are you sorry? We're fighting aren't we? Isn't that what you want?" She shoots you point blank with a magic blast and you smash into the wall again. You struggle to your knees but are knocked away with another burst. You lie on the floor, head spinning and every muscle groaning in pain. All you can see is Palutena's sandals that stop floating and start walking towards you.

"Fool! You repay my kindness with such rudeness, fortunately I'm merciful to give you another chance for redemption." The sandals stop walking right before your face. You notice some of the odor coming from them and your nose scrunches in disgust. Her toes are long, wiggling with anticipation. "From here on out, you'll spend your time under my feet. Until I deem you worthy for anything else. Why don't you show me your gratitude?"
1232.title: A Warrior's Spirit!

12321.content:
You may be hot-headed sometimes, but you're not stupid. Unsure whether another blast from Palutena will cause some serious harm, you rise to all fours to look at her awaiting feet. Her toes still wiggling in anticipation, your face inches away from them, you splutter a little from the smell. "Ugh. The one time I get a vacation..." You think to yourself. You pucker up and press your lips against her big toe.

Immediately you hear Palutena giggling, you can practically feel her smug smile on the back of your neck. You plant kisses on each of her toes, clamping your eyes shut as you do. Your nose stings from the smell and you feel a little dizzy. After a few minutes, you stop to turn your head away for some fresh air. Palutena taps her foot impatiently and you look up at her. "Have you anything to say to me slave?" She gloats. You hang your head and grumble vague thank-yous under your breath. The powerful goddess raises her foot and grinds your head into the floor. Your cheeks graze against the concrete, once you feel Palutena take her sandal off of you she demands: "Look at me when you're talking slave!"

You gaze up at her and try again. "I'm sorry goddess, please forgive me." Palutena smirks down at you and gestures for you to keep talking. "A-and thank you being so kind to someone like me." She seems to be enjoying this a little too much, you're starting to notice she has a bit of a mean streak. "And what kind of person are you?" She asks with a tacit of false concern. Looking deep into Palutena's eyes you swallow your pride once more. "An arrogant moron who isn't worthy."

A collar snaps around your neck and Palutena starts leading you somewhere. Your cheeks turn an embarrassed red as she parades you through the streets. She's quiet for a second as she finds her room on the map but finally acknowledges your comments. "You know, I don't know what's cuter, mortals who think they're tough or mortals that will grovel like a puppy. It's rare to find someone that does both!" She forces you into her room and flops onto a sofa. Palutena uses her new foot toy...
12321.title: You start kissing her feet.

choices: ... that she'd like her feet to be cleaned.
...to invite some girls to share you with.
123211.content:
Palutena makes taking off her sandals painfully slow for you, smirking all the way. She strokes the tops of her feet and digs her fingers in between them and the straps. She meticulously unwinds each one, revealing a small part of her feet with every strip of leather. You feel like making a break for it, but her staff is still close by and you grit your teeth with stress. She finishes her little tease and lifts her feet away from the sandals. Immediately a hazy funk fills the room and tops up your nostrils with an intense aroma. You splutter and gag on the smell. This was not what you signed up for!

Palutena holds up a sandal close to her face and winces slightly. "Oh! You should get a whiff, little man!" Before you can respond she stuffs it into your face, the stink magnifies tenfold as the sweaty leather presses into your nose, you can feel the grimy imprints on her insole, these sandals were well-worn, and you can tell she's been wearing them for a long while. You shake your head violently but the goddess easily keeps it on your helpless face. Out of panic you breathe in her overwhelming scent and hear her say "Yes, get a nice sniff of that!" Eventually she slides off of you, smearing dirt over you as she does.

She clicks her fingers and points to the floor expectantly. You get the hint. Palutena giggles at your resignation, she enjoys watching you lie underneath her. The goliath feet hover above your face, dripping sweat onto your head. The smell is much worse down there, the air is thick and your nose tingles with the vinegary stink. Palutena lowers her feet menacingly, squishing them onto your face with a satisfying plop. She wiggles her feet in place and relaxes, letting the edges of her soles spill over your cheeks. They totally dwarf your face in size and you groan as you realize the only way to breathe is a small space where your nose is pushed into her arches.

The stink floods in with a vengeance and you see stars, you can't find the strength to do anything but lie there and inhale; which only serves to make you weaker and weaker... The sweat washes over you and drizzles to the floor. The best you can do is seal your mouth shut to keep the perspiration out. "Now then" Palutena sighs, squashing her warm feet deeper into your face. "Isn't this a more fitting place for you instead of playing "hero" with that toothpick you call a sword?" Your anger burns once more, who did this woman think she was? But all you can do is bide your time. Palutena flicks on the T.V , allowing her feet to teach you a lesson for her. After 3 hours of huffing soles that are glued onto your face by unending waves of sweat Palutena decides...
123211.title: ...as a footstool.

123212.content:
Almost instantly, her foot in shoved onto your tounge, forcing you to puke a bit on her feet.

"Stupid mortal." The goddess replies. Your just making your job harder. I want my feet spotless"

Helpless to resist, you begin licking her feet until the Goddess gives another demand.
123212.title: ...to lick her feet clean.

1232122.content: You begin to lick in between her toes tu find scattered bits of toe jam all across, sticking to her feet by her foot sweat. The taste is horrendous. You begin to gag. She kicks you in he stomach. "Foolish mortal. I demand you to swallow my toe jam!" You comply and the horrible taste slides down your throat. She smirks. "Now get to your knees and"…
1232122.title: Eat my Toejam.

choices: The Sweaty, unwashed socks she was wearing
13.content:
You'd saved up the money, and it was finally the day! You head off to your local gamestop at 12:00 to buy Super Smash Brothers for the Wii U. Of course, many, many others had the same plan as you, so it took forever for you to be able to get your copy, but you did, eventually. Once you had it, you drove home, and fell asleep, with the game still in your hand.

----------

When you awoke, you were confused. You were lying on the floor in a pink room, not sure where you were, when you heard a voice.

"Oh, good. You're awake!"

You turn around and see the Princess of the Mushroom kingdom, Princess Peach. She's in her traditional outfit, except for one thing. She was wearing long white boots instead of her normal shoes. Aside from that, the only other weird thing was that this was princess peach.

Peach spoke to you again. "I'm sure you know your job, so I'll just let you get right to it."

You're about to ask what that meant when she slowly took off both of her boots, and horrifying stench covered the room.

"I'm glad you signed up for this. I haven't washed my feet since we set up this appointment a few months ago.?

You are in total shock, and the Princess notices. "What's wrong?" She asks.

You want to answer, but you can't exactly tell her that it's because of...
13.title: Peachy?

choices: "My foot isn't clean enough, you missed something"
"You don't look good, let's try something easier."
131.content:
Her feet certainly met her statement, they looked disgusting! Her feet were covered in sweat, and there was some visable toe jam in between her toes. You'd about figured out what the "Appointment" was. You were going to have to clean those?!?

Your mouth was agape with shock, and that was a terrible mistake. Peach swithly took her terrifying foot and stuck it straight into your mouth. You immediately backed up in recoil, it tasted even worse than it looked. You aren't even sure there is a word for how vile it tasted. Again, the Princess notices your disgust. "Oh come on," she says. "They aren't that bad. Remember, you signed up for this." You still have no idea why she thinks this, but you want to tell her that her thoughts are false. You start to, when she puts her foot into your mouth again, closing your mouth before you can recoil. "You aren't leaving until my feet are clean. I have the contract right here."

Peach, with her other hand, grabs a piece of paper, that somehow has your signature on it. If the princess wasn't holding your mouth closed, you'd be agape again. Your shock quickly turns to disgust, however, as she demands that you "Start cleaning." Having no real option, you start to lick her foot. It tastes horrible, maybe even worse than before. "Don't forget to clean in between my toes." Peach cheerfully adds. You continue licking, until you start to reach the toe jam.

Everything about the jam is disgusting. The taste, the texture, the way it feels as it slides down your throat...it's a nightmare. You manage to avoid puking, knowing that it would just add more to the mess that is her feet. It feels like it will never end. Eventually, you choke down all of the jam, and the princess removes her foot from your mouth, and starts to examine it.

"Hmm...." She thinks, as she checks her foot. She sneaks at glance at you, now on the floor of the room, barely holding down last night's dinner. Finally, the princess says something.

CHOICE 1: You missed a few spots, and they are even more disgusting then the rest of her foot. Time to put the foot back in!
CHOICE 2: She takes pity on you, decides to build up to her feet, and to start with something a bit easier...her dirty socks from the last month.
CHOICE 3: You cleaned her foot, but it's time for the other one.
131.title: Her sweaty, bare feet.

choices: Clean her foot and Clip her nails. Go from there.
Bite her foot! She deserves it, and you need out!
Get her attention and plead to be let go.
1311.content:
"You missed quite a bit." Peach annonces. Your eyes widen, what?!? What could you have possibly missed? "You aren't very good at this, are you?" Toadstool asked. "I kind of regret getting you, but, I have to follow the contract." You roll your eyes at this. Yeah, SHE'S the one suffering.

Luckily, the princess doesn't seem to notice, and turns her foot back to you. You recoil once more from the smell, but manage to get a look at the foot. She wasn't lying, you somehow missed one side of her foot...perhaps you were too scared of her toe jam to notice.

"Well, get back to it. Open up." She demands. You resist again, but she kicks you in the stomach; forcing your mouth open, allowing her to bring her terrifying foot back into your tounge. You gag, of course, but Peach shakes her head in dissapointment.

"I just don't understand. I mean, you signed up for this, though you did seem a little weird when you signed, but trust me, there are far worse jobs to do. I mean, my friend Samus' feet? THAT is the underwear in a nutshell. My feet, at least compared to her's, are like roses." You shudder at that thought, and try to start cleaning her feet. You start licking the side of the foot rapid fire, and you hear Peach laugh. *That tickles a bit." She smiles. It's a sweet, innocent smile. Nothing like the situation you are going through right now.

*Hey! While you are there, do you mind clipping my toenails with your teeth? They've needed trimming for awhile." You make a noise that's half groan and half cry, and begin to start biting her disgusting nails. "Yeah, like that! Maybe you aren't that bad after all. I have you for the rest of the day...you'll get better.".

Eventually you finish up her nails, and nod your head as a signal that you finished. She opens your mouth, and releases her foot to check it. She smiles, nods, and tells you that it's perfect.

"Now then, next foot. Nails, clean it, you get the drill." She sticks the disgusting I cleaned foot into your open mouth, and you are forced to begin cleaning it. As you do so, you try to decide what to do next.
1311.title: "My foot isn't clean enough"

choices: You keep it down, and clean the first pair of socks.
You can't hold it, and Peach has to punish you.
1312.content:
"You don't look so good...forget my feet." The princess began. You sigh in relief, your done....except Peach isn't done. "Let's start with something easier." She drags you to another room in the castle, what appears to be her bedroom. You worry what she thinks are "eaiser" to manage, when she opens a door, and grabs a pile of very damp looking socks, One even looks yellow. You shutter at the sight. "All right." The princess explains. "Since my feet were too much for you, I've decided that what you need to do is clean ALL of my dirty socks since we made our appointment. I want each of them spotless!" She grabs a pair of socks, and shoved them into your mouth. "You'll do them two at a time. And if you do it without any issues, We will be good. Ok?"

You aren't ok, but with the socks In your mouth, you can get in a word. You just do as you are told, and start sucking on the socks. You let your guard down, since she considered them eaiser than her feet, but it turns out, your were both wrong. Just one of these socks would have tasted like hell, and you have two of them! You struggle to keep from puking, and to keep sucking the sweat out of the socks, but you barely kept your dinner down when you were cleaning her feet. You try to hold it down, you try as hard as you can....!
1312.title: Last month's Royal Socks.

choices: The sweaty taste of her soles make you vomit, ruining each inch of her feet.
You hold back the vomit and continue licking for as long as you must.
13121.content:
Astonishingly, you are able to withstand the disgusting fumes and taste of Princess Peach's gross feet. They taste like the exact vomit you wanted to release from deep below, but you simply couldn't.

"Oh, so how were the socks? You seem to be getting through my tests quite easily, which does not please me. I will have to make the test harder." You want to negotiate with Peach, but you feel like going against the terms you signed will cause Peach to get angry and forcefully make you perform more work for Peach's feet. Then again, there must be another way. Maybe there is a way around the free labor you must perform. But you aren't exactly sure. You may need to examine the entire castle more when you have the chance. "I've got it!" The princess held her feet in front of your face. You could feel the heat from off her soles. You could smell the stench that continued to leave her feet, probably killing the many Toads guarding her. "You didn't clean my other foot! You WILL clean my other foot IMMEDIATELY!"

Your tongue slowly extended from your mouth. You began to lick within every crevice of her feet. They tasted like salt combined with sweat, which is probably the worst taste a human could possibly ever put in their mouth. Poor taste buds. They must be dying in there! You can't hold it in...you're about to...vomit...you can't take it...
13121.title: Surviving the First Wave, now the Second.

131212.content:
You don't know how you did it, but you managed with all your willpower to hold in your vomit. Just barely. Once the last bit of sweat has been licked off, Princess Peach notices, and lowers her foot from your mouth. You close your mouth, and puke a bit in your mouth, the puke you just managed to hold back a minute ago. With the taste of puke in your mouth, you look at Princess Peach, seemingly disappointing that you managed to get through that, but she quickly goes to her trademark smile. You didn't understand what exactly was going on...was she acting?

"Hm..." Princess Peach says. "Well, it appears you managed to clean my feet, completely. Honestly, I'm surprised. No one's actually gotten this far."

You manage to smile a little. Now, you could finally go home and...

"Don't think you've completed your contract, though." The Princess reveals, crushing any hope you just had. Your expression goes back to insane terror. What ELSE could she do to you? "You have to stick with me for the rest of the day. In 23 more hours, you can go. In the meantime, you may go explore the Castle. Don't think about trying to escape, cause if you do, your stuck with me permanently.

You nod, grateful that you at least get a little bit of time to relax, and, on the bright side, it's not everyday you get to explore Princess Peach's castle. You get up, and sprint out of the room before your Torturer can change her mind.

You walk out the Castle, staying in the castle grounds, and puke into a bush near the castle. Hopefully, Peach doesn't find out about that. You wipe some puke off your mouth, and start brainstorming of ways to get out of the contract you have. The most obvious conclusion would be to make a break for it and make sure they never find you. After all, since when has Peach been very good at getting things done. You could probably easily escape.

...But still, you can't help but feel like doing that wouldn't work. This Peach is already different from the one you know from the games...maybe you should just sneak around the castle and attempt to find something to blackmail the Princess into ending the contract...your not sure what, but you could probably dig up something...

...What do you do?
131212.title: A Miracle...?

1312121.content:
Deciding that you needed to get out of there, you You decide it's time to make a run for it. You hide in a bush (Avoiding the one you just puked in), and make sure there aren't any toads around. Quickly, you run to the forest around the castle. If you're in there, there isn't anyway, Peach could find you. You go past the pond of water and finally reach the trees.

You huff and puff. You ran as fast as you could, and your energy still isn't back from that experience with Peach's feet. You start to walk through the forest, looking behind of you every few steps to check how far you were from the castle. Eventually, the castle was nothing but a speck, and you finally felt safe. "YES!" You yell out of excitement, not worrying about anyone hearing you. Peach couldn't hear you from this far away. "I finally escaped that insane Princess. I don't know what happened, but I just barely escaped, and soon, I'll find a way..."

BUMP

You fall backwards. You hit something...a tree, probably. You got too excited, and weren't looking where you were going. "Stupid tree..." You start to say.

"Did I blind you with my foot odor, or are you just an idiot?" Says a familiar voice. You stop dead. No...She couldn't of found you, that fast? You would of noticed. You turn your head, but sure enough, there she is, Princess Peach, and she doesn't look happy. She almost looks sadistic. She's not hiding behind an innocent smile anymore.

"Probably an Idiot, after all, you tried to escape from ME?" The Princess Laughs. "Well, you know that puke you let out in a bush. I was looking for you, as I had finally come up with a new thing for you to do, when I accidentally stepped into the puke with my socks on. Needless to say, I got pretty angry. Now that I've found you, it's time for you to pay for that.

The Princess takes her foot out of her shoe, and sure enough, her yellow socks were now a dark moist green on the bottoms of the foot, with chunks of food stuck to the sock. She lets her foot fall into a mud puddle.

"Oops. I got that even messier." The Princess Sarcastically says. "Anyway, would you like to know what my new idea was?"

You try to back away from the Princess, but you know there isn't any place to go. Your her's now, forever. You nod your head, you need to end this as quickly as possible.

"Well, if you insist," The Peach laughs, enjoying your fear. She didn't even seem like herself. You wonder what dark secrets she holds behind the smile you remember. "I was gonna use a mini mushroom. You'd be so tiny, and I'd stick you right between my toes. I figured it would feel quite good.". You gasp, that sounds terrible!

"And I've got good news." The Princess starts. "I'm still using them. But instead of the usual temporary mini mushroom, I'm using the one my toads have just found. One that makes you super tiny forever. Your gonna stay in my boot, enjoying my foot forever." Quickly, she grabs a mini mushroom, and shoves it down your throat. In almost no time, you feel yourself shrinking. Soon, you are smaller than one of Peach's toes.

"LOOKS LIKE IT WORKED!" Peach booms. She sounds super loud from this size. "WELL, TIME TO PUT YOU IN!"

Peach grabs you, and drops you into her dirty and smell boot. The stench is terrible, you can barely take it. You puke a little more inside from the terribleness of it. "ENJOY, SERVANT! I KNOW I WILL!" With this, Peach lets her foot crush you. The mushroom manages to keep you alive, so you are unable to die, but instead suffer a fate worse than death. The stench is terrible. You puke as much as you can from the smell, but all of it lands on her sock anyway.

"WELL! YOU'VE GOT TIME TILL WE GET BACK! START CLEANING MY SOCKS! THEY BETTER BE CLEAN BY THE TIME I'M HOME, OR I'LL BE BRINGING MY FRIENDS OVER!"

You know you don't have a choice, so you start licking the puke. it's terrible, and you keep puking, and this continues until you reach the castle.

Then, Peach makes a special call. Every girl in Smash Brothers comes over...and they are all about to have a lot of fun.

"Peachy!!!!"
1312121.title: Sorry, Kid, but your freedom is in another castle.

choices: "I've got plenty more socks for you!"
"I'm gonna make some more sweaty socks for you!"
13122.content:
"BLAASRRRGH!!" The socks were too disgusting, and you puked. The puke covered the socks, and even got on the floor you were laying on. "What?!?" The princess yells. "I can't believe this. I gave you an eaiser task, and you couldn't even take that?!? Fine then, I'm done being nice!" The princess leaves, leaving you alone, worried about what she is going to do.

Peach returns with a roll of duct tape. In a flash, she grabs the whole pile of socks, including the ones you just puked on, and she stuffed them into your mouth, one by one. Each sock tasted worse, and they kept coming until there was only one sock left...the yellow one. "My prized possession. I wore this for two months without taking it off once. It got covered in so much sweat, it turned yellow. This one sock probably tastes worse then all of the socks in your mouth and my feet combined. I wanted to be nice, I was gonna let you skip this one...but I'm done being nice. Enjoy your living underwhere, cause I am." She slowly moved the sock closer to your face, letting the smell overtake you, before shoving it right onto your tounge. On instinct, you begin to gag. She was right, it tasted like she had dropped a liquid poo into a mixture of her feet sweat, her toe jam, and every dirty sock she had ever had in her entire life, and then multiplied the taste by 1,000. Before you could puke again, she got a piece of duck tape, and taped your mouth shut.

"Tastes good huh?" Peach mocks. "And just so you wouldn't puke it away, I duck taped your mouth. I'm such a nice person." She laughed. "If you just held it down, this wouldn't of happened. But at least I get to have some clean socks at the end of all of this." She smirks at you. "Now, suck 'em." You start to do so, and Peach rests her un-clean foot on your nose, taking away any positives you may have had. Not only do you have to suck on her horrible socks, you have to breath in the smell of her sweaty foot.

"Enjoying yourself?" Peach mocks. "Good, becouse...."
13122.title: You Puke.

131221.content:
"Once you clean those up, I've got plenty more. In fact, I think I have a sock even worse than that yellow one, I'm pretty sure that I have one that's even older...a year maybe?" The Princess smiles at the thought.

You start to cry. You're dealing with a hell right now, and now you know there is even more to go. The Princess notices this, and laughs. "Oh, look at that, you are terrible! You're crying! HAHAHAHAHA! Maybe I should call some friends...Zelda might enjoy playing with you.

Your crying increases. You just want to go home, but this Princess has you hooked. What can you do to stop this? You can't and Peach knows this.

Peach laughs more, before getting up. "I'm gonna go bring a friend. Think about it...If you get it right, I'll let you pick what she does to you.

With this, she walks away, leaving you to suffer. You beg in your head, but there isn't anything you can do to escape. Eventually, you calm yourself, and try to suck the socks dry, enjoying the fresh air you have now. You start to think...who is Peach bringing. Considering you were probably brought here via Smash Brothers, it could be any girl from that game. Good thing you know the whole roster.

...But who is it? Time to take a guess.
131221.title: Your suffering isn't ending anytime soon.

choices: Go with what you know, Princess Peach.
Maybe Zelda'll be better? Go with the Hyrule Princess.
1312211.content:
After what seemed like hours, the door to the bedroom finally opened, and in came Peach, who removed the duck tape and the socks for your mouth.

"So, Servant, what's your guess?"

"Zelda!" You manage to spit out between gags. The taste of those socks lingered on your tounge. Peach replies. "Well, I guess you aren't a TOTAL idiot. Zelda, come on in."

With these words, the princess of Hyrule walks in, with a devilish smile that spoke for her. She, like Peach, wore her usual costume, but with long leather boots. "So this is him?" Zelda asked Toadstool.

"Yep, he's the one. I have him all day, so go and do that thing you told me about."

"With pleasure." Zelda laughed. She did a strange motion with her hands, and you saw everything get bigger...no, you were getting smaller! Zelda was shrinking you! Once you were the size of the average spider, Zelda stopped, Instead, begins to laugh alongside Peach.

"Well, you guessed right, so, here's the choice you get. Who do you want to "play" with you? Me, or Zelda?". Peach said to you. "Don't worry, we can hear you."

It took a moment, but you finally made your choice.
1312211.title: Uh-Oh, it's Magic!

choices: Suck on her sweaty toe skin.
13122112.content:
"I'll take Zelda!" You say, barely able to hear yourself due to how small you are. Peach laughed. "Well, I guess he isn't the most loyal servant." She said, giggling.

"Don't worry. Peach." Zelda jokingly reassured her friend. "He'll get quite the punishment for being disloyal. Choosing me over you? Big mistake."

Peach laughed harder. "Oh, that's very true. He couldn't even handle my sock collection, much less my feet!"

"Too bad for him, mine are far worse."

You gulp as loudly as possible, which isn't much. You picked Zelda hoping she'd be eaiser to deal with, and she just shot down your hopes in one swoop. You cry at the thought. There's no way you we're going to survive this day.

"And there goes the baby, crying. 'Wah Wah Wah!" Peach mocked you. Zelda began to take off her boots. "Well then, maybe I should put baby in his crib."

With these words, she picked you up, and dangled you above the terrifying boot. "Hope you like your new home, Baby!" Zelda said as she dropped you into your leather prison. She lifted her foot up and laid it on the rim of her boot, stopping it from going inside. This wasn't lost on the Mushroom Kingdom's princess. "Oh, how generous, Zelda. Letting him get used to your odor before laying it on him. He should be grateful."

Zelda laughed at Peach's words. "Well, no one can 'get used' to my smell, but yes, he should be grateful that he's getting any samples before he tries out the real deal. Speaking of which..." Zelda shoved her sock covered foot into the boot, crushing you and filling your body with immense pain...but somehow you Still lived. "Don't worry about death..." Zelda said, almost responding to your inner question. "...that shrinking spell also gave your body increidibke durability, no matter what I do, you'll still be alive."

"Now then, get to cleaning my foot!" Zelda commanded. "It's pretty bad, too. I'm a little more busy than Peach is."
13122112.title: A new torturer...

choices: Obey Zelda to get on her good side.
Beg to be given back to Princess Peach.
131221122.content:
Not seeing anyway out of the situation you are in, you begin sucking on the sock covered toes of Hyrule's Princess. "Oh, such a good boy!" Zelda responded. "You listen so well. Maybe I should take you home with me."

"Fat chance, Zelda, he's under MY contract." Peach reminded Zelda.

"Yes, yes I know. I was only joking...mostly."

You could tell Zelda wasn't the kind to change socks often, as they tasted like she's wearing them for months. In response to your licks, Zelda began to crush you with her big toe. She continued to do this for several minutes before taking her foot out of the boot, giving you some much needed air. "This is getting boring." Zelda complained. "I'm gonna make it a bit more fun." Zelda grabbed her boot and flipped it upside down, letting you fall to the floor below. Once again, extreme pain hit you once you hit the floor, but physically, you were fine.

"Take a good look, Servant." Zelda commanded, as she began to take off her socks, slowly, allowing you to soak I how bad her bare feet smelt. "Ahh...much better." She moaned once she had them off. "Now the real fun can begin!" With those words, she grabbed you and shoved your face inbetween two of her toes. You were being smovered in toe jam, and the terrible smell of her feet, while both princesses laughed maniacly. Zelda began to crush your head between her toes, slowly increasing pressure.

"Isn't that the best thing you've ever smelt. It's far better than Peach, am I right?" Zelda bragged. The funny thing was, she was right, but you wouldn't conisder that a good thing in this case. Finally, Zelda removed you from her toe space and brought you up to her face. Her breath, while between than her feet, teamed, and you got the full force of it as she spoke.

"Go on, say if! Say you want to be with me forever and I'll agree to your wishes. Just say the word, kid!"
131221122.title: Mmmm...Sweaty Fabric!

1312211221.content:
"Alright!" You manage to say in between gags, her break smelled that bad. "I'll be your servant, just have a little mercy, please!"

Zelda laughed. "Good choice, kiddo. I'll take goooooood care of you." Peach realised what was going on; and began to object. "Hey now, he's MINE! Zelda, you can't just take him from me." Peach never expected you to actually accept Zelda's offer, but now that you did, she wasn't going to let you go EAISLY.

Looking at her toes you can see them glistening with sweat, and loads of toe jam in between them.

Looking inside it just appears like a dark abyss, and you can practice see the stink rising out of it. "Have fun in there!" She says, dropping you in.

152.content:
You finally put enough money back to get the new Smash bros game for 3DS. The hype you have felt for past couple of weeks is unreal. You can't wait to sink hours and hours into a great brawling game with your favorite female character, Samus. You've also got a bit of a guilty crush on her, even though she's just a virtual character. You load up the game and start up a solo match to test out Samus' moveset.

When you determine it's pretty solid you decide to load up a match against some CPU characters. Oddly, when you go to select a map your 3DS screens lock up. The screen goes stark white and actually manages to blind you. You lose control of your hands and drop the 3DS to your feet shortly before falling over and losing consciousness.

------

With a mild headache, you wake up on a cold metal floor. A booming voice announces the infamous five-letter word "FIGHT!" Panicking, you scramble to your feet to see none other than Samus squaring up opposite you. This room, it's definitely on a spaceship, you deduce. With that reasoning, Samus being here with you starts to make sense. Without giving you much time to think, Samus charges into you at a high speed. You land on the ground hard but aren't injured beyond a few bumps and bruises.

"W-wait! I'm like your b-biggest fan! I've played all of your games!" You stammer, hoping the beating wouldn't continue. You were unsuccessful. However, you did manage to stall long enough for the announcer voice to boom back into your ears with: "TIME!"

Despite no knock-outs, Samus was declared the winner. Instead of going to some form of the character selection screen you simply remained in the rather small arena with Samus.

"Good hustle, rookie. I've never seen you here before." Samus mentioned as she took off her helmet.
"Uhh, thanks. I don't think I'm actually supposed to be here." You add, looking around.

"That's not going to get you out of Smash Bros Initiation." Samus mentioned, sternly. You should have heard it from Zelda before you entered the fight. I'm top-dog around here, and my rule is law when the game isn't being played. The sooner you get this over with, the better. Samus starts to remove her exo-suit, all excluding her boots. She looked rather silly in her blue jump suit and oversized-looking boots and you actually chuckled.

"I wouldn't be laughing if I were you, rookie. I'm the one running this initiation, now get on your knees for me." Samus demanded.
Not wanting to anger someone who could literally kick you in half, you comply. Samus approaches you and reaches down to her right boot. You hear a couple of clicks and beeps as her boot comes apart from her calf. Slowly, she slides out of it to reveal...

As if in slow motion, an off-white colored socked foot lifts from the boot with a rather disturbing suction noise.

"Phew! It was really cramped in there!" Samus exclaims, wiggling her socked toes. The sight of the disgusting fabric was enough to turn your stomach, but nothing could have prepared you for the smell! It was as if she had been cultivating a cheese farm in her boots!

"Three weeks." She said.

"Three.. weeks?" You echo, confused.

"Since I've changed my socks, duh!" She replies, removing her other boot. The second socked foot didn't look any better, and made the same gross suction noise as it left the boot and polluted the surrounding air. At this point, you've covered your nose with one hand. Samus paced around you, her surprisingly big feet padding on the metal floor. You noticed sweaty footprints being left behind, and it seemed to enhance and spread the rancid smell of her deadly pair. Without warning, she sits herself down across from you, reclining her feet to your right.

"Ugh. My legs hurt. My feet hurt. I'm not gonna even bother standing while I do this!" She complained, raising her right foot dangerously close to your face. It was far worse up close! There was a clear imprint of her foot on the sock, indicated by the dark gray spots on the bottom. The rest of the sock wasn't faring well either, having long abandoned what you assumed was the original color, white. You coughed as the smell quickly consumed your nostrils and as you turned your head away to breathe not-foot air Samus kicked you with her left foot, repeatedly.

"No, no! Bad slave!" When you turned back around, the foot met your face with a somewhat wet slap. Her foot not only radiated a lot of stink, but also a lot of heat. After a few minutes, you weren't sure if it was her foot sweating or your trapped face. Your nostrils burned from the odor that had no apparent end. Eventually, your arms buckled and you fell backward, head spinning from the lack of clean air. Samus simply prodded you in the back with her filthy socked feet. Her feet still felt hot and sweaty on your back.

"Done already? I don't think so, rookie!" She shouted, peeling off both socks in one swift motion. She whipped them in your direction. Despite your predicament, you dove to catch them. Though it might not have hurt to simply lose the putrid things. They were uncomfortably damp and reeked of sweat and cheese. You retook your place across from her, likely to be subjected to further torture.

1553222.title: Inkling Girl

choices: You think twice about telling this smelly girl to take her shoes off.
How did she get ink in her shoes?
15532221.content:
When you were told that you were randomly chosen to play test Smash Ultimate, you were skeptical, but extremely honored. Now that you find yourself inside the game, you have a few new thoughts running through your head.
Instead of wondering whether or not this is real, you choose to focus on what’s in front of you: according to your guide, you’re now entering Smash Tower, the characters’ residence building. The floor that a character stays on is determined by the order in which they were introduced in the game, meaning a new floor is added every time a new character is invited.

Just as you enter the building, you bump into someone who, previously, you were excited to merely play as: an Inkling girl. She’s in her default orange costume, and she appears to have just gotten back from a match. Although you can’t understand each other beyond a greeting, she seems to understand that you’re a guest and quickly starts showing you around. After you’ve taken in the entire lobby, she drags you over to an elevator. She presses the “up” button, points toward the elevator, then points back to herself; you interpret this as her wanting to show you her room. You aren’t a big fan of enclosed spaces, but if you understand how this place works, then she must live on the 64th floor; you decide to suck it up and take the elevator.

You two enter the elevator and she presses a button on the top row. Just as you’re wondering how to take your mind off your discomfort, something else shows up that demands even more effort to ignore: the smell.
You noticed that your new friend smelled pretty ripe in the lobby, but seeing as she just got back from a fight, you didn’t think much of it. Now that the odor has invaded this entire space, you’re starting to suspect that it isn’t just the result of physical activity. You can’t really describe the difference apart from the strength (nor would you want to examine it to the point that you could), but it doesn’t seem like a purely “fresh sweat” smell. It’s more like she’s been skipping showering after fights for far too long.
You try to think of something that could explain this. You remember that Marie says some not-too-flattering words about Agent 3’s hygiene in your version of Splatoon 2, but who’s to say that the girl next to you is Agent 3?

The combination of her stench and your claustrophobia is making it extremely hard to mask your discomfort. Just as you’re thinking of stopping the ride short, a third thing catches your attention: this time, a sound. Glancing over, you see that your friend is rocking from the tips of her toes to her heels, and her shoes are making a squelching noise as she does.
Did she somehow get ink in her shoes during her fight?
15532221.title: Trapped with a squid

choices: A playful smile (“Hehe, sorry, my feet might be a liiiitle stinky.“)
A confused stare (“Hm? Did something happen? You don’t look too hot.”)
155322212.content:
You tap on her shoulder, then point to her shoes. As she looks down, she seems to finally notice the noise. As she brings her shoe up to her hand, you notice that the foot smell in her mixture of odors becomes noticeably stronger. Just as you start to wonder if this was a good idea, she pries her shoe off, and the smell breaks loose.

Her foot odor overpowers her previous smell in even less time than it took the previous smell to overpower the fresh air. Once it reaches you, the previous smell becomes the last thing on your mind. You’re fixated on two things: the amount of disgust you feel from this hell you’ve unleashed on yourself, and how to protect yourself from it.
You reflexively back away and cover your nose, but one whiff was enough to blow your mind. You’re now certain that she hasn’t washed up in a long time; you could hardly believe such a little girl could smell this foul given all of the time in the world, so doing it in one day was clearly out of the question. Even with your nose plugged, the air you’re breathing feels oppressive as it claws its way down your windpipe.

Despite being occupied with the overwhelming stench around you, you can’t help but stare in disbelief at the Inkling as she raises her shoe up to her face and starts inspecting it. It’s only been off for a few seconds and you’re already afraid you might suffocate, yet she’s practically stuffed her nose inside and has shown no reaction!
She astonishes you even further by turning the shoe upside-down and spilling its contents right there in the elevator. As you were starting to suspect, it contained built-up sweat, not ink. As the carpet soaks up the poison, you notice that her socked foot has its own stain forming underneath it. You make a note to warn the cleaning staff once you make it out of here.
While the shoe situation somehow managed to make you even more disgusted than you already were, she didn’t seem the least bit embarrassed by it. If anything, she seems satisfied to have solved the mystery of the squelching noise, which you had more or less forgotten about. From her non-reaction to her own atrocious stench to her allowing her sweat to stain a public elevator, you have to wonder if the concept of “foot hygiene” ever even crosses her mind.

As she turns to remove her other shoe, she notices your no-longer-veiled nausea. Through your misty eyes, you see her expression change to:
155322212.title: That ain't ink

choices: Make you worship her bare feet?
Smell and clean the insides of her shoes?
The elevator door opens, surprising the two of you!
1553222121.content:
Judging by her amused expression, it was pretty clear that the Inkling was not sorry for taking her shoes off, despite your disapproval to the whole situation. She knew exactly what she did and now, she was going to take your torture to the next level. You silently prayed that the elevator would move fast enough to the 64th floor to escape this foot-stench hell but your hopes were crushed when you saw the Inkling press another button on the wall, which brought the elevator to an abrupt stop. You gulped, realising that you were stuck with her for a while (well until she's had her fun anyway).

With nowhere left to go, you gave up and sat down, trembling a little. This felt almost like a horror movie. The inkling's orange eyes stared at you with curious intent before she reached down to take off her socks, both dripping with sweat. Smirking, she tackled you unexpectedly and shoved the rancid socks into your mouth. You were caught off-guard and your initial reaction was to spit them out but with the Inkling's hands covering your mouth, you lost your will and let the sweaty fabric infiltrate your taste buds.

The first thing you noticed as you chewed her socks was that they were incredibly salty and dry at the same time. It was truly awful but you persevered, getting more and more of that Inkling foot sweat in your body as she taunted you with her "woomies". You weren't sure what she was saying but you were confident that she was taunting you for letting her do this to you.

It couldn't possibly get any worse, could it? What does the Inkling do next?
1553222121.title: Inkling's Sweaty Socks

choices: She makes you lick the carpet foot-sweat stain.
She kicks you in the nuts, and has a rougher time with you.
Suddenly, the elevator works again and you can finally escape this hell!
15532221211.content:
You definitely underestimated just how far this little Inkling was willing to take her foot fun to. As you continued to suck on her rancid socks, your eyes open with shock as you watched the orange Inkling cup her sweaty toes over your nose. She giggled in an innocent playful tone as she wiggled them, attempting to spread the waft of her feet through your nostrils. Naturally, you resisted and initially your determination got you through a full minute of staying motionless, your mind set on not breathing at all. However, this didn't laugh forever and eventually, you gave in and took a deep breath.

As predicted, the scent was far from fresh; in fact, it was like she hasn't taken off her shoes in a few days. With your nose placed directly in front of the smelly source, you started to gag a little, moaning out of the chewed sock from the pure disgust of the situation. The Inkling looked at you, a little curiosity showing at the edge of her eyes, before she removed her hand and allowed you to spit them out. Unfortunately, before you had any chance to recover, the Inkling cruelly smirked and inserted her toes into your mouth before pushing it further in until you were suffocating in your throat from Inkling toes.

What happens next?
15532221211.title: Make you worship her bare feet?

choices: She has you clean her shoes next
She takes you to her room after it starts
Someone new enters the elevator after it starts
155322212111.content:
The taste of her sweat fresh from her feet was something completely different than that from the socks. At least with the socks some of the taste was overtaken by the taste of cloth. Granted there were layers of sweat from over time absorbed into those disgusting pieces of filthy cloth but when it was fresh from the sole of her small greasy foot it was an entirely different story. The salty cheesy taste filled your mouth practically replacing your saliva it seemed, with the hot disgusting liquid. You tried to spit the toes from your mouth several times but she simply kept them crammed inside with the girlish giggles you were quickly growing to dread.

Finally she seemed to change her mind as she pulled her foot from your mouth. You gasped and tried to spit the taste of feet out of your mouth to very little success. Suddenly you felt something on the back of your head before being slammed face first into the floor, unfortunately straight into the disgusting puddle of sweat that her disgusting foot left behind. You began squirming but that was quickly ended when the inklings butt dropped onto your back slamming you to the floor. There was no chance of freedom as she pulled your arms to your side and pinned them there with her legs. You began to panic as her hands once again found the back of your head and began pushing it straight into the puddle.

It took some time to connect the dots as to what she wanted from you considering the language barrier but the way she rubbed your face into the sweat stain and based on you past interactions with her it was clear she wanted the stain gone, and for you to be the one to do it. So with a deep breath, that you quickly regretted, you placed your tongue against the stain and took a lick. It was awful, the taste of sweat along with the dirt of how many shoes that had tread on this carpet. Not to mention it was ineffective, so you went with a new plan. A much worse plan. You pursed your lips, pressed them into the stain, and began sucking the sweat from the fabric. The playful giggling of the girl as she bounced with joy at your tortured display didn't help in the slightest. This was hell, this random inking girl was putting you in a foot hell.
155322212111.title: She makes you lick the carpet foot-sweat stain.

choices: It makes you clean your feet
He uses you as a carpet
1553222121111.content: When you finished cleaning the stain, she turned you around and placed her shoes in front of you while pointing at them and first brought you all the smell that was hidden inside them by placing them on your nose so that when the smell finally disappeared they were cleaned, she He made his tongue stick out and lick the dirt that was in them until they looked new, inside your mouth it was hell but at least she looked happy

Well, there are the Mii Gunners, both of the Smash WiiU and Ultimate iterations!

Which one would you meet in this scenario? ...As in, who just kicked you straight in the face with their bare foot for the final blow of this Stamina Battle? A foot that had come out from their thick and heavy(WiiU)/hard-worked and worn(Ultimate) boots after you managed to throw them off with an almost successful dirty blow to between the legs (for shame by the way). Feet mind you, that are customizable in this universe...for those foot fans out there.

So, who was it?
The younger, less experienced Gunner im WiiU who has been given herself the bigger pair of feet in the roster with a rankest foot odor to boot, even bigger and rancid than Palutena's as you'd find out in live exhibition...or...perhaps...
It was the more mature, seasoned Gunner, who is brought down to average size...but has worked her butt off to get some results to her name by taking down some big key players in this tournament. This getting her hard-working feet all sweaty, which she was soon to use in humiliating you live for an almost successful cheap shot.


Your choice.

info.brief_description: The girls of Smash Bros. have you under their feet!
info.description:
In this story, you are tortured by the feet of the girls from Super Smash.

Rules:
#1. Girls only. No guys.
#2. Tell the story in 2nd person. For example; You look up at Samus.
#3. Your character does not have a foot fetish, and will not develop one. Your character, rather, dislikes this.
#4. Use proper grammar. I understand small mistakes like a misuse of a word, but something like this: 'oooh no i shoutd plz dnt' Will not fly.
#5. Chapters must be at least a paragraph long, except for ones where you're choosing a character.
#6. No sex/sexual stuff.
#7. Keep the feet smelly!
#8. Avoid dirty/filthy (sand, earth, etc.) feet.
#9. Trampling is allowed; however, only very light. Please keep violence/pain to a minimum.

Have fun.
